Class SelectionView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • SelectionView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class SelectionView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The core view of the program. All other GUI windows are accessed through this view.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
